Settings¶

Info¶

Thease settings are used to render the proper values in feeds.

BLOGIT_TITLE = 'Blogit'
BLOGIT_DESCRIPTION = 'This is a blog about everything'

Feeds¶

Feeds can be accessed on /<BLOGIT_FEED_URL>/rss/ and /<BLOGIT_FEED_URL>/atom/ by default. Update feeds using thease settings:

BLOGIT_RSS_FEED = True
BLOGIT_ATOM_FEED = True
BLOGIT_FEED_LIMIT = 100
BLOGIT_FEED_URL = 'feeds'

Note

BLOGIT_FEED_URL value should be slugified. (Use dashes and underscores for spaces, and no special characters).

Pagination¶

Pagination per page:

BLOGIT_POSTS_PER_PAGE = 5

Post url¶

By default post detail url is /<post_slug>/. If you want to have a dated url like this /<year>/<month>/<day>/<post_slug>/, change this setting:

BLOGIT_POST_DETAIL_DATE_URL = False
